official_title: Resolution expressing the opposition of the Congress to certain measures for the curtailment of benefits under the medicare and medicaid programs.

summary.text: Expresses the opposition of the Congress to the enactment of certain measures for the curtailment of benefits under the medicare and medicaid programs.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the opposition of the Congress to certain measures for the curtailment of benefits under the medicare and medicaid programs.
